name: Narendra Modi
Discribtion:
Narendra Damodardas Modi is an Indian politician who has served as the 14th prime minister of India since May 2014.
Modi was the chief minister of Gujarat from 2001 to 2014 and is the Member of Parliament for Varanasi.
Born: 17 September 1950 (age 73 years), Vadnagar
Spouse: Jashodaben Modi (m. 1968)
Education: Gujarat University (1983), School of Open Learning, University of Delhi (1978)
Awards: Order of the Distinguished Rule of Izzuddin, Legion of Honour, Seoul Peace Prize, CNN-IBN Indian of the Year
Party: Bharatiya Janata Party
Candidate for: 2024 Indian general election in Uttar Pradesh

name: Rahul Gandhi
Discribtion:
Rahul Rajiv Gandhi is an Indian politician and a member of the Indian Parliament who represents the constituency of Wayanad, Kerala, in the Lok Sabha.
He previously represented the constituency of Amethi, Uttar Pradesh.
Born: 19 June 1970 (age 53 years), New Delhi
Party: Indian National Congress
Education: Trinity College (1994–1995) · More
Parents: Sonia Gandhi, Rajiv Gandhi
Aunts: Anushka Maino, Nadia Maino
Uncle: Sanjay Gandhi
Organization founded: Rajiv Gandhi Charitable Trust

name: Arvind Kejriwal
Discribtion:
Arvind Kejriwal is an Indian politician, activist and former bureaucrat, who is serving as the 7th and current Chief Minister of Delhi since 2015, after his first term in the post from 2013 to 2014.
He is also the national convener of the Aam Aadmi Party since 2012.
Born: 16 August 1968 (age 55 years), Siwani
Party: Aam Aadmi Party
Spouse: Sunita Kejriwal (m. 1994)
Children: Harshita Kejriwal, Pulkit Kejriwal
Education: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur (1985–1989), Campus School
Awards: Ramon Magsaysay Award for Emergent Leadership · More
Organization founded: Aam Aadmi Party

name: Mamata banerjee
Discribtion:
Mamata Banerjee is an Indian politician who is serving as the eighth and current chief minister of the Indian state of West Bengal since 20 May 2011, the first woman to hold the office.
Born: 5 January 1955 (age 69 years), Kolkata
Party: All India Trinamool Congress
Siblings: Amit Banerjee, Babun Banerjee, Kali Banerjee, Ganesh Banerjee, Ajit Banerjee, Samir Banerjee
Education: Jogesh Chandra Chaudhuri College · More
Nephew: Abhishek Banerjee
Organizations founded: All India Trinamool Congress · More
Awards: CNN-IBN Indian of the Year in Politics

name: Mayawati Das
Discribtion:
Kumari Mayawati is an Indian politician who served as the 18th Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh from 1995 to 1995, 1997 to 1997, 2002 to 2003 and from 2007 to 2012.
Born: 15 January 1956 (age 68 years), New Delhi
Party: Bahujan Samaj Party
Previous offices: Member of Rajya Sabha (2012–2017) ·
Parents: Ram Rati, Prabhu Das
Education: Faculty of Law, University of Delhi (1983) · More
Full name: Mayawati Prabhu Das
Organization founded: Mahagathbandhan

name: Sitaram Yechury
Discribtion:
Sitaram Yechury is an Indian Marxist politician and the General Secretary of the Communist Party of India, and a member of the Politburo of the CPI since 1992. Previously, he was a Member of Parliament, Rajya Sabha from West Bengal from 2005 to 2017.
Born: 12 August 1952 (age 71 years), Chennai
Party: Communist Party of India (Marxist)
Spouse: Seema Chisti Yechury
Children: Ashish Yechury, Akhila Yechury
Previous office: Member of Rajya Sabha (2005–2017)
Education: Jawaharlal Nehru University (1975), St Stephen's College (1973), Nizam College, All Saints' High School
Nationality: Indian

name: Sharad Pawar
Discribtion:
Sharadchandra Govindrao Pawar is an Indian politician. He has served as the Chief Minister of Maharashtra for four terms and has also served in the Union Council Of Ministers as the Minister of Defence in the Cabinet of P.V Narsimha Rao and Minister of Agriculture in the Cabinet of Manmohan Singh.
Born: 12 December 1940 (age 83 years), Baramati
Party: Nationalist Congress Party
Previous offices: Minister of Consumer Affairs, Food and Public Distribution of India (2004–2011) · More
Spouse: Pratibha Pawar (m. 1967)
Children: Supriya Sule
Education: Brihan Maharashtra College of Commerce (BMCC)
Organizations founded: Nationalist Congress Party, Maha Vikas Aghadi, Indian Congress (Socialist)

name: Akhilesh Yadav
Discribtion:
Akhilesh Yadav is an Indian politician and national president of the Samajwadi Party who served as the 20th Chief Minister of Uttar Pradesh. Having assumed the chief minister's office on 15 March 2012 at the age of 38, he is the youngest person to have held the office till date.
Born: 1 July 1973 (age 50 years), Saifai
Party: Samajwadi Party
Spouse: Dimple Yadav (m. 1999)
Children: Aditi Yadav, Tina Yadav, Arjun Yadav
Education: JSS Science and Technology University, Mysuru. · More
Aunt: Kamla Devi Yadav
Organization founded: Mahagathbandhan

name: Uddhav Thackeray
Discribtion:
Uddhav Balasaheb Thackeray is an Indian politician who served as the 19th Chief Minister of Maharashtra from 2019 to 2022 and the Leader of the House, Maharashtra Legislative Assembly from 2019 to 2022.
Born: 27 July 1960 (age 63 years), Mumbai
Party: Shiv Sena (Uddhav Balasaheb Thackeray)
Spouse: Rashmi Thackeray (m. 1988)
Children: Aaditya Thackeray, Tejas Thackeray
Education: Balmohan Vidyamandir, Sir J.J Institute Of Applied Art
Cousin: Raj Thackeray
Grandparents: Keshav Sitaram Thackeray, Rama-bai Thackeray

name: Lalu Prasad Yadav
Discribtion:
Lalu Prasad Yadav is an Indian politician and president of the Rashtriya Janata Dal. He is a former Chief Minister of Bihar, a former Railway Minister of India, and a former Member of Parliament of the Lok Sabha.
Born: 11 June 1948 (age 75 years), Gopalganj
Children: Tejashwi Yadav, Tej Pratap Yadav, Rohini Yadav · More
Party: Rashtriya Janata Dal
Previous offices: Member of the Lok Sabha (2009–2013) · More
Spouse: Rabri Devi (m. 1973)
Education: Patna College (1969), Patna University, Patna College
Organizations founded: Rashtriya Janata Dal
